item.title: HTML Frames: Enhancing Web Layouts with Frame Elements
item.description: HTML frames provide a powerful way to divide a web page into multiple sections, each with its own content. Despite their declining usage due to modern CSS techniques, frames remain a valuable tool for certain scenarios, such as creating sidebars or displaying content from different sources simultaneously. In this article, weâ€™ll explore HTML frames, their syntax, attributes, and examples to help you understand and utilize them effectively in your web designs.
